content: halloween treat for you i just created a cute little halloween creature and i m giving the pattern away for free meet the pumpkin-headed creature a tiny spooky-fun amigurumi perfect for halloween decorations or gifts it s seamless quick to make about 1 hour and available in italian english and spanish suitable even for beginners ✨ free pdf pattern step-by-step instructions included easy and fun to crochet download it now and start your halloween crafting add a touch of autumn magic and playful spookiness to your crochet this halloween
